attributes.action: Apply to join the union of the United States of America
attributes.additional_details: The United Kingdom should apply to join the union of the United States as the States of England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland. Each would be given two Senators, while they would have almost 100 Congressional Representatives combined, allowing them to have more influence in Washington than the UK ever had in Brussels. Geographically, London is almost equally as far from New York as Honolulu is from Los Angeles. Let's join the USA and become a part of a global project that actually worked!
attributes.background: A great compromise between membership of the European Union and complete isolation is membership of the United States. It's the world's largest economy, best military and 2nd largest single-market after the EU. Everyone speaks English, and there is an unparalleled cultural and historical link.
